++ Ideal Method

IM is how TheSystem attempts to choose the best possible method of accomplishing a task. It is a specific promotion of UseBest and [Optimum] where there are multiple methodologies ([Algorithms]available to achieve the same goal but there is likely to be a more ideal method. This method depends on variables.
